price: Sema: Hakika hapana yeyote awezae kunilinda na Mwenyezi Mungu, wala sitapata pa kukimbilia isipo kuwa kwake Yeye tu.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا
footnotes: Sema: Hakika mimi hapana yeyote awezae kuniondolea adhabu nikimuasi Mwenyezi Mungu. Wala sipati pa kukimbilia, kuikimbia adhabu yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul innī lan yujīranī mina al-lahi aḥadun walan ajida min dūnihi mul'taḥadan
